thread.title: Carole Laird
thread.title_full: Warrior Trading reviewed by Carole Laird

author: Carole Laird
title: Carole Laird
text: Excellent. A well rounded teaching program, helps every step of the way to reach your goal. For new traders and experienced traders, Warrior Trading teaches various strategies allowing you to choose which one suits you best. In the chat room I learn something new every day!
